title: KnightRealms eVo LF Plat+ Jungler
body:
Add me in game KR Chaser or post your app in the recruitment forums on our website.   Please have KR eVo in topic as we have a first team KnightRealms eSports. knightrealms.esportisfy.com
Must have mic
Must be 17+
Must be able to shot call
Good communication 
Easy to get along with 
Willing to practice and learn. 
New season must get to diamond 3+ in solo q by mid season 
Committed to team.
Also must main New Meta Jungle. Will not waste my time on players that don't.
Edit: For who ever has tried to go on the KnightRealms website to post an app, please post one here . The site is currently undergoing maintenance.

replies.body:
I added you in-game :) 
i meet all requirements
